title: 6B. Lucy Parsons: Firebrand Anarchist
itunes:title: 6B. Lucy Parsons: Firebrand Anarchist
description: In the second part of this two-part episode, Alex finishes telling Jay about Lucy Parsons, a turn-of-the-century Anarchist and labor reformer whose personal mantra (we assume) was "burn shit down."
